overview: When a door to door lingerie salesman discovers his hidden powers of persuasion, he puts them to good use, helping lucky studs land their very first milf! A pool boy is summoned inside and it's not long before the lady of the house seduces him for her personal pleasure. Everywhere the salesman goes, another happy young man sees the way of the horny milf ... you never forget your first!
title: My First Milf
